website_summaries.verdict: The best overall nano drone for anyone wanting to increase their skills for stunts, take offs, and landings.
pros: Small, lightweight body is very agile in the air, making it good for quick flying and stunt work
Fan blades are protected by an outer ring so the drone can hit walls and trees without catastrophic failure
cons: Charger and battery have been known to arrive in a poor state with a short charge

customer_reviews.title: I’m 9 yrs old and it’s very easy to learn to fly
customer_reviews.text: I got this drone for Christmas, and it was my best Christmas gift. I’m 9 years old and it’s very easy to learn to fly. This is my second drone because my last one flew into the fish tank and didn’t survive. I will be more careful with this drone. I already feel like an expert and have been flying it on the high power mode. The 3D flip is way easier than my last drone and so cool to show people!
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Product information
customer_reviews.text: In the Product information it states the Product Dimensions are "13.5 x 4 x 13.5" inches when the Helicopter Drone is is only 5.125 x 5.125 in. . I bought this for my grandson for Christmas and was looking forward to giving him a larger Helicopter Drone "13.5 x 13.5 in.". I have no time to mail it back and get a new one as I have to wrap it and get it in the mail so he can get a gift from me under his tree for Christmas . Even if you measure the box diagonally its only 11x11 in. so people beware!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my original review. After I posted review describing somewhat negative experiences flying Predator drone, possibly due to manufacturing defects, I was promptly contacted by the Holy Stone customer service who offered to send a replacement drone free of charge! I am very impressed to see how they stand behind their product! Replacement drone was indeed free of defects which I've described in the original review. Now I think it's a good product, and customer service is just unbelievable. Taking one star off though, for the defects in the original drone - 5 stars would go to product, for which I'd not have to be in touch with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mostov

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn't work out of the box.  Revised review as replacement eventually sent.
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment for my son who got the drone for his birthday as 1 motor didn't work. Seller wanted me to post YouTube video of the problem. Huh? It's a motor that doesn't work...the blade doesn't spin, how much more will the video tell? Then, they suggested I fix it myself. Though I have fixed my drones before, including replacing motors, I shouldn't have to fix a new one. I can't vouch for anything with this drone other than 3/4 blades will spin. Addendum. Company sent me another drone, which works fine, so I added a couple more stars. Not 5/5 because I still received a defective drone on 1st attempt and was told to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Encephalo

customer_reviews.title: Blades pop off all the time
customer_reviews.text: I spend more time replacing the white quad blades than I do flying the drone. This is small and cheaply made. The battery does not have an enclosed compartment. When the drone crashes the blades pop off. When the drone lands too hard, the blades pop off. When the drone takes off, sometimes the blades pop off just for fun. I would spend more and get more. I planned to return the item, but as advertised, it is easy to fly (when the blades are on). And let's face, it is cheap. But I also bought a better system so I could spend time flying.
customer_reviews.author: RaH

customer_reviews.title: Won’t break!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew who promptly flew it into the ceiling- this thing is indestructible! It flew all over the place, everyone laughing till we were in tears. It is hard to control compared to a full blown drone. This seems to operate much like an old school Nintendo game where you have to be careful how much you throttle it up. That being said, older kids and pre-teens will have a hard time destroying this thing. (Yeah I know it’s supposed to be 14+ but you’re not going to get high enough to worry about airspace and all that other FAA stuff). So I give it 3 stars- it’s indestructible but the controls were tricky
customer_reviews.author: Abby L

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating after much research and anticipation...
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating. My son and I researched and researched, finally settling on this drone for him to purchase with his own birthday money. Initially, after reading the entire manual and doing the calibration as recommended, it flew "okay." Then after putting in a second battery (my son purchased two extras, only one of which worked), the drone wouldn't hover... it just drifted along the floor to the right and forward. We re-read the manual, re-calibrated everything, changed back to the original battery, tried using the trim buttons as directed, etc. This thing still drifts forward and to the right. Sooo frustrating. If anyone has a better suggestion, we would love to hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted one of these even though I am a grown man. Decided on this one from the great reviews. Now I can see why! This is a very cool little drone. Easy to learn and very easy to manage . I would suggest outdoors when first learning though since I damaged a ceiling tile on my first flight oops! Battery is good for about 20 minutes of flight time. This has taken on beating, running into stuff by accident and some hard landings but it is quite indestructible. I like the fact that it does come with extra props in the event you do break one. Great for beginners and a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Scott McLean

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I have had two drones and neither would ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I have had two drones and neither would hold a constant altitude and hover. This unit takes constant, ongoing adjustment. It is either going up or going down. After recalibration it got better, then worse. Even trimming isn't a permanent solution. I certainly wouldn't recommend it for a small child. Recommend upgrade to the HS170G. Much better.
customer_reviews.author: pd

customer_reviews.title: Problem Resolved!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this drone for for my ten year old son as a present. Out of the box, the drone was not working properly as it would drift off to the side and could not be corrected by “trimming controls” on the remote. Upon contacting Holy Stone, troubleshooting the problem, and determining the drone was defective, we were sent a new drone free of charge as a replacement. I have to say working with Holy Stone to correct the issue wasn’t a big deal and the replacement is working as expected. My son can now use it with ease and we are very happy with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: nightowl3

customer_reviews.title: This is the drone you want for "discerning" first-time drone pilots!  Very fast , easy to fly and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8yo son. He LOVES it. Very fast and fun. Very "savage" in his words! It's quite easy to fly but has the ability to keep a well-experienced drone pilot entertained. This drone is very rugged. Which is good when it comes to my son's early flying trials. It will fly for a good amount of time on a fully charged battery (which is included). It comes with everything you'll need right out of the box. They even give you an opportunity to get a free second battery! We are very happy with this purchase. In fact, we'd buy it again if we need to.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Lefebvre

customer_reviews.title: fly well and still work great a year later- the kids love them
customer_reviews.text: We have previously purchased 2 of these drones. The copters we have are durable, fly well and still work great a year later- the kids love them. We recently purchased another HS170 for a friend and had problems getting it in the air. I called customer service this morning and they are sending a replacement out right away. It's too bad we couldn't get the drone working properly, but are very happy with the prompt and courteous customer support. I'll update on replacement product and delivery when received. The new drone was received within a few days and works perfectly! We are more than satisfied with the mini copter AND the excellent customer support! GREAT product, excellent support staff
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Remote control sometimes has trouble calibrating
customer_reviews.text: Hello, My experience with this drone has been amazing, It has worked flawlessly and even outside, it works great, even with a slight breeze. I would buy this again, and is definitely one of the best starter drones I have ever seen for the price. I also noticed in the box, you get a card that allows you to get a second free battery, so that adds on to my satisfaction for this product. that also leads me to say how excellent the battery life is for such a cheap drone, and it makes the experience so much better. This product is mostly indoor use but can be used outside. I rate this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna T.

customer_reviews.title: While small enough to fly inside, this drone is not great for a first time user
customer_reviews.text: While small enough to fly inside, this drone is not great for a first time flyer. Mine ran away as soon as I synched the controller with it. The first time it flew straight up into my ceiling. Thinking I did something wrong, I reset / re-paired it and it did the same thing, losing a propeller in the process. It is hard to pair. When it does pair then the drone sometimes just takes off with no throttle input from me. I have to push the throttle forward and back all the way down again only for the copter to crash.
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: Decent little quad.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this quad on the 23rd it arrived on the 24th. First flight was that night outside in the dark. It flies well enough. It was pretty breezy and faught the wind hard. It is not a good trainer. You need to know how to fly with this one. Flight times come up short of the advertised time ad I'm getting about 3.5 to 4 minutes on the lower power setting. This little quad would benefit greatly from altitude hold. It does fly better than my Proto Nano. Easier to control. Throttle/ rudder stick sticks if moved all the way to the left or right. This is not a training quad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff m

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners not extremely sturdy but a good start
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband along with an extra 4 pack of batteries and charger. The design of this slides the battery pack over the connection wire and it’s solder connection and over time depending on how much you use it it breaks the wire connection off. That being said we own a second one now and we are much more careful and don’t have the problem now. My advice is change your battery gingerly and it will last you long enough to decide if you want to invest in a bigger better one. For us for now this is just enough fun at our price point.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Holy Stone, Holy Moly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this quadcopter: it's awesome, and not very expensive. It's the perfect size for practicing indoors when the weather is bad. The controller is well-organized and easy to use. It's been easier to get used to than any of my others (4 of them!), and easier to fly. It is obedient, responsive, nimble, and quick. If you're having trouble with yours, just read the manual (it's written better than most of the Chinese translated imports), and do what it says. Those complaining about it here seem to have some unrealistic expectations. Highly recommended for beginners or experienced pilots. I'm very pleased with mine. And, although people get rewards for reviews, this one is the honest truth. YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even get to fly it....something is smoking!
customer_reviews.text: My son received 2 drones for Christmas this year. Neither were worth 2 cents. The Holy Stone HS170 Predator didn't even see any air time. After carefully following the instructions and properly charging the battery, the fun began. I plugged the battery into the drone as instructed and it immediately sparked, a flame appeared for about 1 to 2 seconds, went away and then the unit smoked for about 4 to 5 seconds. Needless to say, I returned this drone back to Amazon the next day with no hassles. Thanks Amazon. No thanks to Holy Stone.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Corum

customer_reviews.title: Cheap w annoying beeping
customer_reviews.text: First read the directions carefully as you should. After connecting to controller and adjusting the trim the stupid thing just heaps continuously over and again it’ll drive you crazy! BEEB BEEB ...Bb bEep BEEP. So annoying. You’ll also just keep having to repeat the start up procedure repeatedly doin a session or it’ll not function. The controller came with the right stick broken. The joystick falls down into the controller,to get it to work you have to pick it out and try to fly by barely touching it.
customer_reviews.author: UCC

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good product
customer_reviews.text: I had some concern about its durability after reading reviews before ordering. But i am happy to tell you that it is performing very well after playing it daily for past three weeks. I have smashed it against walls, floors and others numerous times and it is still working well. one time, it was dropped from 5 story high to ground and still ok. i am amazed by its durability. i would still rate it 5 star even if it stops working today since i really abused it for the past 3 weeks. I have no problem to control it. It is very sensitive. Overall it is a great little product.
customer_reviews.author: John CA

customer_reviews.title: DOA- Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Update: Was contacted via email by Libby at holystone yesterday and received a replacement today. Amazing customer service. The drone works and Im very happy. The quality of their customer service is out of this world. I will only buy my drones from Holystone. Thank you Libby and Holystone! This is my 3rd drone from Holy stone and unfortunately it wont turn on, I have multiple batteries to test so its the drone itself im thinking the wiring is loose as my previous drone had the same issue. Waiting to hear back from holy stone, as I know they have phenomenal customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews4u

customer_reviews.title: Good drone from excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: I owned a previous version of this copter. This version has a substantially improved battery, plus to be honest the plastic bumpers are very good for protecting both the device and the environment. My kids have fun chasing it up and down the block. I've flown it up to a few hundred feet in height. I've had repeated trouble replacing the rotors, which is something that needs to be done to these drones sometimes. I've ripped more than one motor off when tugging the rotor, so be more careful than I was! My purchase was direct from Holy Stone and they were particularly helpful, above and beyond what customers have any right to expect. Thanks to them.
customer_reviews.author: Best Desk In The West

customer_reviews.title: Easiest beginner one I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the most bang for your buck in a small drone you can get. While the Remote controller does what you need to it drifts slightly one way or another as the trim settings are not tight. But easily managed once you get the hang of it. Would be nice to have a stock of extra batteries to keep on playing with, and this is one of the easiest I have seen of its caliber to control. Would be tops on any Christmas list for and inexpensive gift.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: fun and robust little drone to fly!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good drone. Fun to play. Response is very agile. plastic is at high quality, and look cool. robust and can take a lot of hit, drop, and still work very well (as compared to my previous baby drone worked for half a day, and not working anymore after some drops). The battery last long enough for a good flying session. The lighting is bright and easy to determine the heading of the drone. The fancy trick flip can impress people well. the only minor annoyance is that every time I need to fine tune the pitch and yaw in order for it to stay still in air.
customer_reviews.author: A.F.Chan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This drone is perfect for flying around the house and driving my male Corgy crazy. He loves it and I love to fly it. And its tough. He has grabbed it out of the air many times and it keeps on flying (extra blades are advised). This drone is my second Predator in case my dog finally kills the first. But I fly a little higher and it has survived. Easy to fly. Doesn't self hover like my more expensive drones but is easy to control and maneuver for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Flew this drone 3 times and the motors started giving out. No major crashes or any heavy usage at all. This is the second holy stone drone that I've purchased that had the exact same issues! Very disappointed.. Update: after reading my review holystone reached out to me and offered to send me another drone. Happy to say the replacement drone is awesome! Drone is super fast and is very easy to fly. After flying this drone I see why it has so many positive reviews. Thank you holy stone for making this right!
customer_reviews.author: Denno Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and cost effective entry level drone - highly recommended for anyone wanting to give them a go
customer_reviews.text: The Predator quadcopter was very easy to setup and get right to flying by a novice. Given its very light weight, it is susceptible to wind and even the slightest gusts, but with practice can be kept stable and flying. Had a few not so tender landings, but the Predator is quite durable and bounces right back. The 6 min flight time per charge is short, but given the size of the quadcopter understandable that there are going to be limitations on weight and size of the battery. Looking forward to being comfortable enough to pull the flip moves!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Spaltro

customer_reviews.title: Great little drone
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, especially for the price. It's very responsive and lots of fun. I was impressed with how percise the controls are. I was looking for something inexpensive that I could use inside & outside. This is it. I initially had a problem with it always wanting to go forward. I discovered that I had been pairing it incorrectly which caused some problems. After closely following the instructions, it flies perfectly. One criticism is that I wish it came with a few more spare blades, but they are cheap enough to buy separately
customer_reviews.author: Rich Gold

customer_reviews.title: Rugged Drone
customer_reviews.text: This thing is rugged! Small, but rugged. I've crashed this thing MANY times, by the time of this review, but it keeps going. We got our daughter a larger one, for Christmas of 2018 (not sure of model or brand), and I got this one for myself later. We fly this one way more. Especially inside due to it's size. Outside, a slight breeze will make it hard to navigate, due to it's small size, but it is fun and rugged. A basic drone, (no camera, etc) but it is RUGGED and can survive a crash or two, or three..... Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: becky937a

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great done for the price. My 9 yr old saved up his chore money to buy it. It is fairly easy to fly and he caught on fast. He took it outside on advanced mode and it is really fast. Range is pretty awesome. There is a process for pairing remote to the drone each time you use it that is slightly cumbersome but not a big deal once you get to know it. Make sure you read the manual. There are some cool features as well as a calibration mode if your gyros get out of wack. It seems to hold up pretty good to all the objects he drove it into learning to fly it in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 4

customer_reviews.title: Non flying drone
customer_reviews.text: This drone is a waste of time and energy. I thought it would be useful to scare pigeons away but it doesn't ever leave the ground and only holds a 6 minute charge. I did get it to flip over a couple of times but that was about it. It came with the propellers on and instructions that contradicted the placement of the propellers. i tried them several ways to no avail. I didn't expect much from this mini drone and wasn't surprised when it didn't perform.
customer_reviews.author: glassine

customer_reviews.title: The controller did not work, no power whatsoever. ...
customer_reviews.text: The controller did not work, no power whatsoever. Tried multiple sets of brand new AA batteries. The drone did charge normally and appeared functional, but with no controller it was a moot point. I researched this drone to buy as a gift for my father. Disappointing that it did not work out. This is the only item I can recall having actually returned on Amazon. I don't know how widespread this problem is, but in case this is more than an isolated incident, I felt it was my responsibility to write a review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of practice to understand how to fly this
customer_reviews.text: The box says 16+ so it all makes sense. But I am 26 and it wasn't super easy to learn, after some practice I would probably have it down. But my 6 year old bought this and has become very frustrated with learning to use this, however, this is the first time he's ever used a drone so you would assume there will be quite a learning period. Also, the drone size itself would fit in the palm of 2 hands. The remote control is much larger than the drone itself. Flying-wise it has good speed and height.
customer_reviews.author: Rose S

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Horrid, my kids are fairly tech savvy, and we have purchased a few inexpensive drones. ( lost them in trees, batteries that stop charging, ran out of blades) This maybe the worst one yet. Very difficult to control, it was broken in the 1st 15 minutes. It went out of control and flew straight for his head cut his finger and broke 2 of blades. Now one of the motors is super slow so it won't lift straight. Just a pile of sheeet
customer_reviews.author: workonzoom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday present for my 11 yo son. I recommend flying this in a gymnasium or some large indoor space until you get the hang of it. Grass got caught in the propellers and messed with the timing of the trimmers. It got to the point that two stopped spinning altogether but we can get it flying again if we tinker with it a while. Also, be cautious of flying it outside because the propellers come off easily and are nearly impossible to find in the grass. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not Good Quality. Returned 3 of These.
customer_reviews.text: This is now the third return on this drone. The first one the controls didn't respond, the other would never calibrate correctly and the third one of the props doesn't spin correctly at start up causing it to lift up erratically. While Holy Stone is great about returns and wants you to rate them with 5 stars, it just isn't warranted. Too bad the quality isn't better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: It's best to research
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my preteen son. We couldn't figure out how to get it to fly, but it buzzed, propellers spun, and lights blinked. A quick youtube search helped us move the propellers to the correct position, and maneuver the remote correctly to achieve flight. I love the product now. It was a process, but I'd recommend it to others with the knowledge that they need to lookup videos to use it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Delora Idehenre

customer_reviews.title: Great First Drone!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little "Beginner" Drone. Easy to charge... Looks good and I'm looking forward to improving my flying skills with it before I get one with a camera! It's really tough! On one of the first flights Inside (Like many, I was in the "deep freeze" -24 ̊ outside! I flew it (accidentally) into a ceiling fan! LOL! Yes, the ceiling fan one, but the Drone was no worse for the beating... I picked it up, turned it back over and started flying again! Well worth the money to practice on.
customer_reviews.author: Coachingguy

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: After a few flights I too noticed a lot of friction when inserting a fresh battery. I made 2 little slits in the top shell just wide enough for the two wires, glued them down, and now battery slides in and out very easily. I added .5 ounces (sticky-taped to bottom) which makes it more stable especially if a little wind pops up during flight. I also ordered the 6-battery/charger accessory kit for it. It takes approximately 50-55 minutes to charge them all at once which will give you around 30 minutes of flying time. So far this quad has been great and it is helping me learn to fly quads.
customer_reviews.author: Dickw

customer_reviews.title: Thought this would be a good beginner model
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with the one i originally purchased. I provided a review of the product. I had given up on the item but the seller contacted me about the problems and offered suggestions. When that didn't work, they followed up and offered to send me a free replacement and let me keep the original for spare parts. The second one works great and I have had no issues with it. You should be cautious of crashing into walls and hard items as the propellers do break easily but they give you color coded replacements. Other than wishing it was a bit more durable, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro T Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: It's compact and a bargain Really fun indoors and outdoors
customer_reviews.text: It's compact and a bargain Really fun indoors and outdoors. It doesn't have a power switch like my f181 and lacks the more expensive drones ability to hover. The sensitive vehicle control can be difficult to get used to. Indoors I bounce off the ceiling a lot. Unfortunately after 3 months the lack of a power switch, and constantly unplugging and plugging in the connector caused the power connection at the PCB to separate. It would be a challenge to resolder. No worries Holy Stone customer service is phenomenal!! They replaced my broke drone for Free, even though the return date has expired. Thanks Holy Drone!!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Miltztrey

customer_reviews.title: It's a good option for a kid's first drone ever
customer_reviews.text: It's a good option for a kid's first drone ever. It's simple to use it for a kid, the lights gives a cool look, the controller is big but not too big for a kid to grave it. It comes with 4 extra propels for replacement, because you can expect a kid to brake a couple on the first days of use. Downsides. The come-home function does not work very well, if you use it indoors you will probably see your drone crashing with a wall or furnishing. Also the automatic flip function, not sure way, not always works. It's a cool feature (kids love it).
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Casanova

customer_reviews.title: Best Drone For the Money - A blast to Fly!
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding beginner to intermediate drone for indoor or outdoor flying. Features include 3 speeds of command execution. Level 1 for beginners. Levels 2 & 3 for more advanced flyers. It is extremely durable, able to withstand a good solid knock and remain intact. LED lights make for a very cool look and are good for night flying. The battery lasts for a good 6 to 8 minutes and recharge is 30 to 45 minutes. Additional batteries are available for not a lot here on Amazon. If you are looking for a solid drone to learn how to fly, or want one that will zip around super fast and maneuverable, check this one out. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RobKimWill

customer_reviews.title: Love Holystone
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my 13 year old brothers whom have owned a drone before and lost it on the first try. They still have these 3 weeks later. I feel they are great for beginners and the best thing you will find in this price range. Holystone seems to be gaining popularity and I am glad to know they cater to a wide variety of budgets. Nobody wants to spend $150+ on a drone and fear loss. Once you experience Holystone for this price you will want to upgrade. I also bought an HS200D for my oldest son and after experiencing it for myself I am looking into buying the HS700 for myself.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Flies great a bit sensitive for me
customer_reviews.text: I will have to update in a bit- worked fine the first time out of the box after charging battery. then all of a sudden it wouldnt lift up anymore. It's possible that my son did something to it and I have not had time to figure it out but I will update when I do. But first flight was great. Updated 10/29/18- from 2stars to 5stars- the seller Holy Stone has been nothing amazing with helping me fix this issue- Seems like this was a user error and the company has been more than helpful in trying to fix this - Thank you
customer_reviews.author: kristi rugeley

customer_reviews.title: A truly remarkable drone for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have flown profession drones as part of my job. I find it hard to believe Holy stone can come out with a capable drone for the price range. This small drone is very easy to fly at any skill level. It has three speed modes Flip mode Headless mode Emergency stop button And most importantly altitude hold flight times around 8 minutes the remote is well laid out. I highly recommend this drone to anyone looking to get a inexpensive drone that offers a lot of features for the price rang
customer_reviews.author: Rick Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not that easy
customer_reviews.text: Not that easy to control. Mostly vertical control. It seems to inexplicably suddenly rise, often well out of proportion to control inputs or previous inputs. Many flights wind up pinned on the ceiling only to be slammed to the floor. Hover, pivot & trim all seem to work well. Crash bumpers work well. So far, withstood many crashes without damage. Charging a little awkward having to unplug battery. Still...decent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Beazle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fly and learn drone
customer_reviews.text: A lot of improvements from the first rendition. Remote takes 2 aa batteries instead if 6. Remote is labeled now with functions. Excellent drone for indoor and outdoor flying in breeze weather. Three speed great for beginner to advanced pilots. I do the flips indoors too. So easy to maneuver with a lot of power. I leave the prop guards on, it flies great with or without them. I highly recommend this drone.
customer_reviews.author: motor cycle lover

customer_reviews.title: Good toy drone for the price. Don't have high expectations.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son as a birthday gift and he has been having so much fun with it. We are having a bit of trouble figuring out just how to best operate it and by the time we do have a grasp of it, the battery ends up dying. That doesn't take long since the battery only lasts about 8 minutes total flying time. But for the price,it's a really good toy drone. Just be sure not to pick it up with the remote on because if those propellers start turning, it hurts! He's only been using it for 3 weeks, but he's having a blast! One of the better toys we have bought him.
customer_reviews.author: Lopez Family

customer_reviews.title: The drone is a great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product! It is a fun toy to have. I've had one for 3 years and just bought another one for my brother. It is easy to control, small enough for indoor use, and durable. I have ran it into the wall many times and it still works. For the price, it is a great little toy. It does take a bit of practice to get the hang of flying it though, so don't expect to be a pro at it the first time you ever fly one.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Baert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The quadcopter arrived on time, however the transmitter joysticks are both broken. I suppose I could try to fly just using the little nubs, or maybe superglue the broken parts back on, but for this price, I don't think a buyer should have to perform repairs straight out of the box. I'll contact manufacturer and see if replacement transmitter is available. Edit: I was contacted by HolyStone customer support immediately and offered a solution that was very satisfactory. The issue is resolved, and I am able to use my product. Revising my rating to reflect this company's excellent customer service. Also, the quadcopter is operating perfectly now!
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Give it a shot!
customer_reviews.text: I would like to amend my earlier review. Yes the first drone stopped working pretty immediately; however, once I mentioned something on Amazon a replacement drone was sent out immediately. I am very impressed with the level of customer service that I have receieved! My son flew the drone about a dozen times and it suddenly stopped working. On the first day it stopped working!!! Never even got to take it outside. So disappointed. My son thinks santa made a bad present!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the Second Day
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty easy to fly. The remote is super cheap, the Drone feels solid. I ran out of battery and when I charged it back up and plugged the battery to the drone the motors took off like crazy and the remote will not pair. I tried to find the answer in the handbook and it's not there so I assume it's junk. Oh well. I learned a lot on it in 24hours and I'm probably going to get a different unit with a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Matt k

customer_reviews.title: Cool Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 1st one we purchased was defected we sent it back and they sent us a new one. I even wrote the company about the defect. My boyfriend learned it pretty fast and was flying like a pro. A little to good and flew it into a tree. Bought him another one and now he flies it low lol!! The company later reached out about sending us a new one for the troubles we went thru being it was a xmas gift so now we have a new one for back up 😉 thank you so much. Read directions and practice with patience and you'll be ok
customer_reviews.author: v v

customer_reviews.title: Motors do not last.  Remote control not very responsive.
customer_reviews.text: I am an advanced flyer. Very disappointing. Not a good drone for a beginner. Remote control not very responsive. Does not fly well indoors and not really responsive enough for out door flying. I slight breeze, hard to control, blows it away. Lots of drift. After about 20 flights the motors started burning out. Purchased four new motors, have had to use three already. I had to modify batter bay, so that I could insert the battery without breaking the connector wires on the drone. I do not recommend this drone! A frustrating wast of money!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: A pretty decent mini drone
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I just received this drone yesterday. I purchased this for my son. Here are my pro's and con's Pro's - fast and responsive - works well - great 1st time drone Con's - flight time (ok 6 minutes)states 5 - 8 minutes flight time, I thought I would get 8 - 10 minutes of flight time - propellers (1st one fell off during flight), not screwed in, just pushed down to secure to motor - So 2 of the propellers are now unusable All in all, you will not be too disappointed with this drone. I guess I will have to go out and buy spare parts since I see that it will be a possible necessity.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Teply

customer_reviews.title: This is your training drone. YOU NEED THIS IF YOU WANT TO LEARN TO FLY A DRONE
customer_reviews.text: GPS tracking or hold will not always work and can fail. This is why everyone needs to actually learn how to fly a drone without the assistance of GPS hold. This is your drone for learning and having fun. You don't need a camera at this point and the controls are AWESOME. Easy to fly in the house and outside with little or no wind. You can fly it at night and still have orientation with the lights. Plus it can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Madhungarian

customer_reviews.title: Good Drone For The Money
customer_reviews.text: It's a great beginners drone. It is fairly easy to fly without all the added features of the new ones. You can get spare parts for it but for the price it's basically cheaper to replace it. The parts are over priced, especially the batteries. Other then that it's a great drone to learn on. You will get bored rather quickly because of no camera but they can be installed with a little ingenuity.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Scott Rickert

customer_reviews.title: helpful customer service
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the drone we purchased. It works well and is pretty easy to learn how to fly. Probably took me 20-30 min to become pretty proficient and I've never flown a drone before. We had some trouble with the controller linking up with the drone but with helpful customer service, we were able to diagnose and fix the problem: a bad AA battery. Thanks, Holy Stone
customer_reviews.author: moonlooker

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Plus customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem with my Predator and contacted Holy Stone by Email. Within 20 minutes I had a reply from a real person. I explained to him what happen and sent a picture with my reply. Well to make a long story short he made arrangements to have a new unit shipped to me at no cost. I recieved the replacement unit 5 days later and I am back up flying. I am not a experienced drone pilot but I have found this drone to be very easy to train on. The bottom line is Holy Stone has the best customer service and I would highly recommend them if you are looking to purchase a drone.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF WALSH

customer_reviews.title: Wiring not very protected and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 14 year old. Bought the extra batteries and faster charging accessories etc. He flew it only a couple times and it was broken. The wiring became severed. We tried to fix it. Even tried to Souter the wire back together but was unable to repair it. I’m very disappointed. I want to order another one because I feel like I have as much invested in the accessories as I do the drone itself but am afraid the same thing might happen again.
customer_reviews.author: mitey

customer_reviews.title: Holy Stone Drones are fun and affordable. This new drone is incredibly acrobatic.
customer_reviews.text: I love the team at Holy Stone. This is my second drone from them and there will be more. Great support team there. I love flying the drones but the aerial photos have become a favorite of my friends and neighbors. If you live in the country there is no limit to the fun you can have shooting photos of old barns, seasonal photos and family events. So simple to fly. I just hand the controls to friends and family and wait for the smiles to appear on their faces. Great fun at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Spock

customer_reviews.title: Tech support stands behind their product - very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I got this drone for my son’s birthday and it arrived defective. After a brief conversation with the tech support listed on Amazon, they were able to issue a replacement free of charge. Bernard was the representative I spoke with and he was extremely helpful. This manufacturer and distributor really stands behind its products. I am very impressed and I would highly recommend purchasing from them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: The battery was dead and don't like the product in general because of the way remote ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. The battery was dead and don't like the product in general because of the way remote is not controlling the on/off and manual connection of battery to power up drone sucks. Unfortunately we got damaged product too.
customer_reviews.author: tracker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product..but awesome(er) customer service
customer_reviews.text: These drones fly amazingly well. I had a problem with mine. It just stopped flying. I wrote a review saying I was unhappy and within five minutes, I had an email from a wonderful girl named Echo. She asked for some info which I promptly provided and they sent me a new one. Immediately. I will only ever buy Holy Stone drones. I plan on upgrading soon and I will definitely stick with this company. They even offered me a 20 percent discount on my upgrade when I decide to do it. Awesome product and awesome customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Rothell

customer_reviews.title: Learner
customer_reviews.text: Its a great little toy, definitely was one for beginners to play around with and learn how to control a quadcopter. I say was because i learned my lesson day 2 these are indoor only toys... unless you're a master at flying dont take it outside or the wind will take it from you and not give it back. My fault not the manufacturer. Only bad thing i could say about it is the controller seems like its huge for no reason at all.
customer_reviews.author: John Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times and a propeller broke. Went to replace it and the blade wouldn’t come off. The entire motor ripped off and tore the wire. I am not mechanical and so now it’s going in the trash. I don’t think it’s high quality and I wouldn’t recommend it. Adult user no kids.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: This is the small drone to buy!
customer_reviews.text: Our family gift exchange produced eight drones this year - this mini and seven mid sized. Six of the drones were the same model from another manufacturer. I received this HS 170 to practice with since I crashed/destroyed the large drone my family game me last year. This mini is not only light weight, but out of the eight used, it responded the best to it's controller and was the easiest to operate. Two of the mid sized ones (different manufacturer) used by my adult sons broke within three flight segments and they reportedly cost twice as much money. The Syma X5C also responded well to its controller and was easy to operate/learn on.
customer_reviews.author: JupiterOEK

customer_reviews.title: Defective. No power at all.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased additional batteries and a charger. Upon arrival I followed the directions for charging and installation. Upon turning on the remote control (which lights up) then the drone (which would not light up), the drone seemed defective. No power at all. Even swapped out newly charged batteries and still no response. Have tried everything to initiate power and following the trouble shoot guide....nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Great starter drone
customer_reviews.text: Great 4 channel drone for beginners. Has auto level so is definitely a first step. Handles light winds fairly well if the controls are set on 2 or 3, but beginners should start indoors. Go ahead and order extra batteries and props, as normal wear and tear will affect flight characteristics, even if it’s not obvious that the propellers are damaged. The drone itself is durable and props are easily press fit for replacement. The controller is simple and responsive. I love mine and will order another for my kid as this one is mine!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S.

customer_reviews.title: Wanky at best.
customer_reviews.text: All over the place, if your not going up or actively flying it then it comes.down fast. It did take some hard falls to the concrete and still operates but its really not fun. Originally o was looking to buy a few as gifts for kids at the co.pany Christmas party but it sucked so I stuck it in the drawer beside me and it still sits there. Not worth the batteries that are still in the controller....
customer_reviews.author: Thomas r frohlich

customer_reviews.title: This little guy is a blast!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a a Christmas gift to myself. My first "drone" that would teach me the finer aspects of flight without the bells and whistles like auto hover. You actually have to FLY this one! Took me a bit to get the hang of it and i still have not explored everything it can do but it is really fun. Buy extra batteries when you order it. I get 6-7 min per battery but with 2 extra batteries that's not a problem. Because you are actually flying this one 18 min is quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Junk, Don’t buy these anymore.  They ruined a good product!  They are now cheap junk!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy these anymore , I have owned 7 of these, They used to be great little drones! The early version held 6AA batteries then they held 4AA batteries and the one I just received has only 2AA batteries! The newest version is junk, has no range, hard to bind, just falls out of the sky when hit the invisible barrier. You guys ruined a great product. I’m sending it back to finding a new company....
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable and faster than you think toy drone!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is a perfect "toy drone". It's faster than you think and certainly more durable ... To be honest: I'm pretty rough on this thing and try a lot of stuff that gets me crashing ... And it continues to bounce back like a champ. I'm not interested in going miles up and away to record video of the landscape ... Maybe one day, when I have that kind of disposable income? For now, I'm just looking to play around: chase after the kids, weave around the neighborhood, fly around the house a little and things like that. It's perfect for what I would have a drone for!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Ward

customer_reviews.title: Exciting drone
customer_reviews.text: My son is very excited about this drone it's quick and has lots of different settings that are exciting like a button to call it back and the flipping he is going to be 11 and finds this drone easy to fly and maneuver we were almost going to buy a larger drone from the same company but it's about to be winter here and I told him that the big ones going to be way too hard to fly in the house he has no trouble maneuvering this drone through the house very fun and exciting.
customer_reviews.author: rachel Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good customer support
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to fly, my 8-year old loves it. It's going to take her a lot of practice to fly it well but the drone is very forgiving of crashes, even indoors. The landing gear does a good job cushioning a hard landing. The rotor blades come off rather than break, but they tend to go flying - buy yourself some spares. He had a problem with one of the motors burning out after the 3rd flight but Holy Stone customer support was very helpful and responsive. They sent me a new set of motors and we're back in business. This is a very good drone for the price and the support is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: Good $, Helpful Customer service
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son received this for a birthday gift and Immediately loved it. His dad read through directions and helped get it started. After the first flight the white propellers popped off (which is normal). We put them back on but the drone wouldn't fly off the ground. After contacting customer service we were informed that the propellers were put back on backwards. After fixing that issue the drone worked great for several flies until the motor burned out on one white propeller. We contacted customer service again and they are sending a new drone. I will update review after we receive and fly new drone. Great customer service!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with the service of Holy Stone! I ordered this drone as my first beginner device.. it was a little slow to respond and didn’t hold altitude well, I think one of the motors was malfunctioning... I scheduled a return. Then the seller contacted me and asked what happened. I told them and they offered to send me another upgraded drone for free and to just keep the first one. The new upgraded feee drone worked way better, flys great and is faster than the original! Thx ! Very happy with this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Remote - Not for Small Hands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone so I did not fly it much. The remote is HUGE. Larger than the original Xbox controller. There is no grip to it at all. My hands are XXL and even for me, it felt very large and difficult to hold. Would be very difficult to use some of the functions. If I didn't know better, I would have thought that I got a return and someone included the wrong remote. I guess that is why there are no photos of it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Entry Level Drone
customer_reviews.text: Great Drone! We have tried a few other drones and the Predator definitely seems to be a solid little drone. The first thing I noticed is that it's much quieter than the previous drones we purchased. The manual was pretty easy to read compared to others and the packaging was good. Battery life seems to be as advertised. Very easy to use. My 12 year old picked up on the controls fast than I did. (Update-12/20/17) We loved the drone so much that we bought a second one for our youngest son. They love flying them inside and out. Excellent customer service too!
customer_reviews.author: Ian N.

customer_reviews.title: Two quit working the day after receiving.
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this as his first drone. He flew it the first day no problem. The next day it wouldn't even left off the ground. All propellers were in place and wires were connected. Everything was charged. Even put fresh batteries in the controller. Didn't help. Requested a replacement which was immediately granted. The next one did the same exact thing. It is being returned and a third not being bought. I hate to leave a negative review but I can't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Good learning model - great website
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone. I bought it to learn on before possibly moving up to a camera drone. The instructions are not really good and complete for a rookie flyer.but looking forward to learning to fly it. I'm glad I found some fllght instructions on Holystone's web site. They will be helpful. The price is good for an experiment to see if you would like to buy more expensive models.
customer_reviews.author: Texas country girl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent drone for beginners, since it has an altitude level which doesn't let it fly away. We lost already 3 drones to winds. Its easy to maneuver and take pictures while simply flying. The kids had a great time with it. It takes nice pictures as you can see attached photos as a sample. It took minutes to set up and was easy and enjoyable. It has 4 speeds so the kids can adjust it according to there experience. It was great seeing they include extra propellers with its protecters. Holy stone has fantastic customer service. I would recommend everyone to purchase a holy stone drone.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this drone as a Christmas gift for our 9 year old daughter. She has been using it over the past few months along with her dad. They are having a blast with it. The drone took a little time to learn the controls, but our daughter is flying it well now. We have tried using it both indoors and out. Indoors works great, however, outdoors is just too windy for this little guy. It doesn't have enough weight to keep it stable even in a slight breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kindra

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 yr. old nephew. He was so excited when he got it and played with it regularly. However, after a few weeks, I noticed that he wasn't playing with it anymore. He said because, after a week, the drone stopped working. Either the remote control or the drone wouldn't fully charge, and the red light is continuously on even if they were charged overnight. So, this was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: KWalk

customer_reviews.title: Great drone
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best drones, if not one of the best, probably the best, ("D" best). I can't say enough of how excellent this awesome drone is. This holy stone HS170 drone is practically perfect. Forget camera, fpv, altitude hold,GPS and all of that, this drone's performance is great, practically perfect. I flew this drone to the point where I could barely see it and the wind was considerably strong, I flew this drone back against the breeze with ease. This drone can handle a considerable amount of wind and is considerably stable. The best drone in it's class. Deserves nothing less than five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cheaply made and it's pretty small. It fits in the palm of your hand. The controller is extremely cheap, it's a hunk of plastic with janky controls. With all that being said I think it a a pretty good toy for children under 12. It was a big hit at christmas. Just know that it's cheap, but a child wouldn't notice that it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Lando Flash

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: The drone is NOT a good training drone. It is small as can be. We have lost it in trees numerous times (despite the fact that we always flew in an OPEN FIELD). Most of the time we were able to retrieve it. However it isn't so easy to find. Our last fly the drone went into a tree and we never got it back. It was so tiny we just couldn't tell where in the tree it was. If you're a first time flier better to use a drone that is larger and perhaps even find a way to spray paint it a neon color so it is easily spotted when it eventually gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Maral

customer_reviews.title: Holy Stone HS170 PREDATOR
customer_reviews.text: Great little flyer, don't abuse to much it will throw propellars off like crazy. You get what you pay for, customer service is excellent and they really go out there way to make a good experiemce for the customer. However at the end of the day this is a toy, Do not expect more than that and you will be happy. 5 star rating based on an ok product with great customer service. I strongly suggest gouung to the HS200 it will be a better build quality and will be a good quad copter that will withstand more.
customer_reviews.author: JTCrawfordTop Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: It is ultra light and easily carried away by the slightest wind
customer_reviews.text: It is ultra light and easily carried away by the slightest wind. Regardless we had lots of fun with it while we had it but it just died, for no apparent reason, exactly after two months. Update: No sooner had we posted our comment than their customer service people contacted us and, sent us a new drone within 2 days. Am amazed by how quickly they resolved the issue. I am a happy customer and would definitely buy from this company again. I have therefore raised my stars from 2 all the way to 5.
customer_reviews.author: Temamen

customer_reviews.title: Their customer service has been very good. So far the drone is working as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Update 1-4-18: Holy Stone contacted me and sent out a replacement free of charge. They even told me to keep the original one for spare parts. Their customer service has been very good. So far the drone is working as it should. Original Review:My son got this for Christmas. It broke in less then 24 hours. I called customer service and they were helpful and mailed me a set of replacement motors. I have installed the replacement motor, only one of the originals stopped working, and that motor runs constantly as soon as the battery is connected. This was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these as a Christmas present for our daughter, and for the price, this thing is awesome! It's easy to learn and a ton of fun to fly. It is well built and allows for increased difficulty levels for more aggressive flying. It has lasted several weeks without any issues (unlike a previous drone we bought that was more expensive and literally only worked twice before failing to fly properly and eventually being thrown away). I'd definitely recommend the Holy Stone drone for any beginner looking for an inexpensive and fun drone.
customer_reviews.author: Hart_S

customer_reviews.title: Begginer drone, good flight, amazing customer support!
customer_reviews.text: I had some initial problems with my first drone and the customer support was awesome at resolving my issues with amazing customer service. This drone is fun for the house and great to practice with. Its small, quiet and hovers well. If your purchasing a drone to play around with while hanging on the couch then you wont have anything negative to say about it. But great support from Holy Stone, I wasn't a big fan of the brand but after dealing with a company that cares for its customers, that's golden. Will come back when in need of more toy drones.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph N

customer_reviews.title: This little thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought it being skeptical on the project but when I received it it is amazingly fast easy to fly a lot of people are posting bad reviews on this product because they have no experience on flying drones it takes time to learn but once you get the hang of it is awesome to fly Ifly this every day superfast inside my two bedroom apartment you need to learn how to fly in the open field light wind before you could fly indoors but once you do you'll love it awesome product I will be buying another one soon thanks
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Miracle
customer_reviews.text: Ok...so we had one more Holy Stone drone still in the box...new...(I bought 6 as small gifts for grandchildren)I take it out for a short flight and BOOM...she takes a dive into the pool...panic mode...not going to take a swim for it I run for the leaf net...now it’s on the bottom...pulled it out..lights still blinking...hit the controls and she takes flight again...It’s a miracle I yell...no...it’s just the Holy Stone Drone
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Fun little guy
customer_reviews.text: Zippy little drone, lots of power, sturdy construction. It's a little tricky to fly. I crashed it a bunch of times..😐😐it takes a licking and bounces back to fly again. No altitude hold so throttle needs constant attention (not for kids). Charges quick but dies quick. I'll most likely buy the four bank charger and batteries so I can practice flying for longer periods of time. All and all it's a cool little drone
customer_reviews.author: Wc

customer_reviews.title: Very stable and easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: My son has one of these so when was visiting last month he brought it with him After watching him for a bit, I took the controls and let tell you this is a fun little drone .that is easy to fly when in slow mode. Push down on the left stick and transfer it to fast mode and watch out, as it is very fast ( to fast for me at the moment). I would recommend this to anyone looking at getting small drone to fly in the house or around the front yard. It doesn't have a camera, so you need to keep it were you can see it.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this little drone. Very resilient, fun and super quick. I definitely recommend this for people with a few hours of flight time under their belts. Not really for younger kids for their first drone. Unfortunately after a few rough landings, one of the motors stopped working. Upon investigation the problem was a faulty solder joint (top right in the photo) that was easily fixed since I own a soldering iron. 5 stars for Holy Stone (-2 stars for the drone they sent me)
customer_reviews.author: Blizz

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drone. I would recommend. As a beginner, I have crashed it many times over the course of several days and it's still going strong. Deducting a star because the sticks on the controller are too delicate. A small bump broke off the top of the right stick. Tips: (1) Start flying on the lowest speed. (Press down on left stick until you hear one beep). I started flying on the highest speed and had a lot of trouble controlling the drone. Then I read the manual more carefully and discovered the speed setting. (2) You may want to purchase spare propellers. They break easily when the drone crashes. But they are cheap and easy to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Mint Farm

customer_reviews.title: New
customer_reviews.text: We opened the box and found a broken, dirty, obviously used product. It wasn’t going to work, so we boxed it up and started the return process. I’d give 0 stars if I could. UPDATE: After requesting and receiving a refund, the seller offered to send another one, which I declined, at first. I thought about it, and agreed to accept a new one, and it was sent immediately. The replacement seemed to be a brand new item, no dirt, and no broken pieces, and it works as expected. We've had a blast with this drone, and once you figure out how to work the controls, it's a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: BrigitteGC

product_meta.title: Holy Stone HS170 Predator Mini RC Helicopter Drone 2.4Ghz 6-Axis Gyro 4 Channels Quadcopter Good Choice for Drone Training
feature_bullets: Headless security system enables players of any level to fly the drone easily
More stable and flexible with 6-axis gyro stabilization system
Good PERFORMANCE of wind-resistant control range: About 30-50 meters
Flight time: about 6-8 minutes Charging time: about 45-60 minutes (under currents input 0. 5A-1a)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars7,203 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
